msbt.message: I just love having company! It's a nice way to mix things up every once in a while, . Please, stay as long as you like!
It's no five-star resort, but feel free to relax here as long as you'd like.I'll try to be a soothing presence. Of course, not so soothing that you fall asleep.
Hmm AhOh, I'm sorry! Here you are trying to talk to me, and I've got my head in the clouds, . I wonder if this is what folks mean when they say they feel like they're living in a dream
Ideally, I'd like my home to be a place where everyone can come in and just simply relax, . Even if that means they get so relaxed they fall asleep. It would be like an impromptu sleepover party!
I recently read a great book called Pillows of .The entire story takes place in a dream. It was extremely surreal. And had surprisingly few recipes.

I wasn't expecting company, but it's always a joy to see you!ThoughI guess now you know my deep, dark secret. I'm a huge slob. Just look at the state of this place. But now that you know, I feel like a weight's been lifted!
